test.name: Register an already existing username

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Given I am on the Register page
Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
Navigates to the specified page using the link id, saves the page name as a variable for later use by steps in the same test. Uses nested variables prefixed with the page name.

kw.name: When I register with MathildaG and a valid password
kw.source_name: I register with ${username} and a valid password

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And Click on the register button
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I should see a message confirming successful registration
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id:register-message' contains exact text 'Registration successful! Redirecting to login...'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: And I should be redirected to the Login page
kw.source_name: I should be redirected to the ${page_name} page

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.
Used to assert that a redirect have been made and updates the page variable initially set in the "I am on the page_name page" keyword

kw.name: Given I am on the Register page
Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
Navigates to the specified page using the link id, saves the page name as a variable for later use by steps in the same test. Uses nested variables prefixed with the page name.

kw.name: When I try to register again with MathildaG and a valid password
kw.source_name: I try to register again with ${username} and a valid password

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Then I should see a registration error
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id:register-message' contains exact text 'Username already exists. Please choose another.'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Test to make sure the system doesn't allow a username that already exists.
